title: Introduction to C++ Programming
introduction: C++ is a general-purpose programming language known for its high performance, extensive libraries, and object-oriented features. It is widely used in system programming, game development, and more.
details: Learning C++ involves understanding syntax, data types, control structures, and object-oriented concepts like classes, inheritance, and polymorphism. It also provides support for low-level memory manipulation and direct hardware access, making it suitable for performance-critical applications.
